attributes.action: Extend the stamp duty holiday for a further six months from March 2021.
attributes.background: Exttending the stamp duty holiday will help people afford to move whilst they are being hit badly by the threat of redundancy and job loss due to the Covid restrictions

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend the Stamp Duty Land Tax holiday in light of the spike in CV19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551713

Extend the Stamp Duty Holiday for an additional 6 months after 31st March 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550545
